abstract.t: The MPLS Transport Profile (MPLS-TP) being specified jointly by IETF and ITU-T includes requirements documents and framework documents. The framework documents define the basic architecture that is needed in order to support various aspects of the required behavior. This document addresses the functionality described in the Survivability Framework document [11] and defines a protocol that may be used to fulfill the function of the Protection State Coordination for linear protection, as described in that document.
